page.title: 02The M4 And World's End
page.content: The M4 is the busiest route in Europe. People go from the area to London, Swindon and Basingstoke by the M4 and people drive to the area. Also trucks pass through the area to reach the motorway and exit 13 is just 2km away. It has releaved the local road from commuters to the larger towns and cities. It has created trade, but has also removed some. It has made easy access to destinations. Some people believe it does not affect their lives at all: though some people think it causes a certain amount of pollution. Residents often complain of noise when the wind is blowing their way.
